website_summaries.verdict: Great design for teaching babies how to eat and also includes utensils.
pros: Clover shape makes it easier for baby to teach themselves how to eat
Rubber edging helps prevent sliding and skidding
BPA-free and microwave and dishwasher safe
cons: Some said the utensils were too big for their babies' mouths (but better for toddlers)

customer_reviews.title: Love those plates and even the spoons
customer_reviews.text: Love those plates and even the spoons, though I personally think the forks are useless. Plates are not too light to easily move around on the table and the rubber bits under the plates act like stoppers.
customer_reviews.author: Novelle

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Love these plates! They are easy to wash and can be used in the top dishwasher rack. You can even separate the borders for an even deeper clean without the worry of there being mold. The utensils are really cute and work well for kids who are starting to learn how to use utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Maria T TorresOrtiz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. My daughter loves these! She starts learning feed herself.
customer_reviews.author: Mtn DU

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!! And my toddler seems to be eating better and more independently with minimal mess now, the silverware design also helps her eat neatly and efficiently. Wish I would have gotten this for her sooner
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: ... my 6 month old girl still but plates stay pretty still on the table even if she really tries ...
customer_reviews.text: Spoons and fork a bit too big for my 6 month old girl still but plates stay pretty still on the table even if she really tries to grab it all the time. Like them!
customer_reviews.author: Helene Engblom

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t really keep them from tipping. My 6 month olds figured out how to pick them up and toss them off almost immediately. It is nice that they come apart to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Efranklin

customer_reviews.title: Cute set!
customer_reviews.text: The plate, spoon and fork are super cute! I love the colors and the quality is great. It has been used for 5 days, 15 months toddler loves the fork and spoon.
customer_reviews.author: gracie

customer_reviews.title: Plate
customer_reviews.text: Spork allows babies to eat independently, which is very practical and has a good physical texture.
customer_reviews.author: lin jolin

customer_reviews.title: I got this when my son was 2 month old ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this when my son was 2 month old. He is 14 months now. He used the orange plate only twice. I followed the instruction and use the top level of our dish washer. It turned to be shrunk. See the attached picture. I wish I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can not boil in the water
customer_reviews.text: This can not boil in the hot water.....i am boiling baby’s all the bottles and stuff to kill the bacteria. But it changed shape when i boil it..........so wasted my money.......
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why the plate come out all the time. And splitting food few times
customer_reviews.author: Crystalbaby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My Great Grandson loves it. He has now learned to feed himself better and he will only use this fork or spoon when it's time to eat. It's very high quality material and the grip is very easy for him to maneuver the food to his mouth. Excellent product. One set stays at my house for when he visits.
customer_reviews.author: Vannis

customer_reviews.title: easy  to  eat
customer_reviews.text: my baby like it.it is easy to eat for baby.and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Qiu

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: used it for over 1 year now, buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: Initial

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my friend and she very like it
customer_reviews.author: Tinaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Very cute design however it’s not practical. The fork is useless and the plates cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spoon and fork are perfect for little hand
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it. Spoon and fork are perfect for little hand. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... all the reviews that I had finally found a good plate for my 14 month son who can basically ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping by reading all the reviews that I had finally found a good plate for my 14 month son who can basically pick up everything and then it usually goes flying in the air and onto the ground during dinner time. The first time I gave him food in it, he picked up the plate and turned it over... I think that they're super cute and once he gets out of the throwing stage, I'm hoping to be able to use them. They seem very sturdy and the color is so vibrant! Just not right for us at this time.
customer_reviews.author: jsmha81

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great quality and easy to handle by my LO.
customer_reviews.author: Shakie Graves

customer_reviews.title: Looks like toy
customer_reviews.text: Looks like toy rather than eating tools to me and to my toddler as well. Cute but not useful or practical. I am sticking with my OXO stuff!
customer_reviews.author: bubblie

customer_reviews.title: Baby Plates
customer_reviews.text: Nice, only wish it had suction cups to keep baby from turning it over.
customer_reviews.author: Dodi

customer_reviews.title: Great for a toddler with fun shapes
customer_reviews.text: Great for a toddler with fun shapes, colors, and easy to hold. One plate fell on the floor and now it has a big crack down the middle, but we can still use it. Company may want to look into a way to make it unbreakable since it is being carried around by children.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Twin-Toddler-Approved
customer_reviews.text: These have worked out really well for our twins (1.5-yrs old at the time of writing). The plates are harder to pick up versus other designs, but they certainly can and will be picked up by precocious babies and toddlers. Aside from that, the lip of the plates make it easy for kids to pick up slippery foods that tend to lie flat and resist picking up (like banana slices). The fat handles on the utensils are also good for little fingers. The whole set cleans easily by hand or in the dishwasher. Despite the price being a touch higher than other sets, I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Llawrednav

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids starting out on solids! Very large!
customer_reviews.text: Barry late place and utensils. Not ideal as first weaning plates Material good quality. Brand good. But failed to deliver with these plates. Hence 3stars
customer_reviews.author: brais

customer_reviews.title: the kid spoon is truly awesome
customer_reviews.text: I strongly recommend the kid spoons. But, the plate is too easy to be stroked down by my 5 months baby. And it doesn't fit the high chair tray either.
customer_reviews.author: Howard2012

customer_reviews.title: Sadly they look like dog food plates
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Sadly they look like dog food plates.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Kids flipped them over and threw them on the floor
customer_reviews.text: Kids (11 month olds) flipped them over and threw them on the floor within minutes of playing and biting on them. The plates and utensils are super cute. Hopefully I can get them to stop flipping them 😩🙏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Pettersson

customer_reviews.title: and the representatives are not easy to be understand
customer_reviews.text: Production information shows 4 pack,you send me 2 pack,and the representatives are not easy to be understand.But you finally sent me the other 2 missing packs after many times' communication with representatives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a dog bowl
customer_reviews.text: In the official photos, these look whimsical and cute. In real life, they look like dog dishes, and they don't fit on the high chair tray. The white plates have become very scratched as well. Not happy with the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: EK Fritz

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of plate, spoon and fork, ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of plate,spoon and fork ,but i get plate and fork ,so ,i'll never buy things from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My baby is 16 months old and she flipped the ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 16 months old and she flipped the plate right away and every time I serve food on the plate, she flips and throw away plate!! She loves spoons and folks though. I also wish it has dividers so the food doesn't get mixed up. Cute design though.
customer_reviews.author: sleepytheif

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughters favorite plate. She can feed herself by using the spoon. The color is cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

product_meta.title: BABYBJORN Baby Plate, Spoon and Fork - Orange/Turquoise, 2-Pack
product_meta.description:
Color:Orange/Turquoise| Item Package Quantity:1The BABYBJORN Plate and Spoon make it easy for children to eat by themselves.

BRAND STORY
By BabyBjorn
feature_bullets: The plate's three-leaf clover shape helps kids scoop up food onto the spoon and fork
Easy to clean; the plate, spoon and fork are all dishwasher safe
The plate rests firmly on the table and is designed to withstand tipping, even if the child bangs on the plate's rim
Spoon and fork have a short, easy-to-grip handles that works with the right or left hand
Made with safe, BPA-free plastics that are safe for baby to chew on

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars109 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
